meta.title: Felipe Travassos - Fullstack Developer
meta.keywords: HTML, CSS, SCSS, Sass, JavaScript, JQuery, TypeScript, PHP Composer, NPM, PHP, Laravel, MySQL, SQL Server, Oracle SQL, PostgreSQL, NoSQL, MongoDB, Wordpress, Bootstrap, Codeigniter, Vue.js, Vuetify, VueCli, Vue Router, React, Angular, Node.js, GIT, UI/UX, APIs REST SOAP, Pegasystems, Outsystems, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Animate, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Gulp, Unit Testing Jest PHPUnit, AWS.

a1.title: A1 - Beginner
a1.desc: I can understand and use familiar and everyday expressions, as well as very basic phrases aimed at satisfying concrete needs.

a2.title: A2 - Basic
a2.desc: I can understand isolated sentences and frequently used expressions related to immediate priorities.

b1.title: B1 - Intermediate
b1.desc: I can handle most situations encountered while traveling in areas where the language is spoken.

b2.title: B2 - Upper Intermediate
b2.desc: I can grasp the main ideas of complex texts on both concrete and abstract topics.

c1.title: C1 - Advanced
c1.desc: I can understand a wide range of longer and more demanding texts, and recognize implicit meanings.

c2.title: C2 - Proficient
c2.desc: I can express myself spontaneously, very fluently, and precisely, differentiating finer shades of meaning even in more complex situations.

c3.title: C3 - Fluent or Native
c3.desc: I have a full command of the language. I'm a native speaker.

portfolio_subtitle: Explore some of my works and projects
aboutme_content_p1: Hello and welcome to my website/portfolio.
aboutme_content_p2: I am a fullstack developer from Recife, Pernambuco, Brazil, with extensive experience and knowledge, working in web application development since 2010.
aboutme_content_p3: With a career that started in the era of Flash, I have accumulated a broad mastery of development methodologies and tools, communication theory, video editing and assembly, music and sound, design, and typography. My technical versatility and creativity enable me to deliver robust and innovative solutions.
aboutme_content_p4: I am passionate about music, playing several string instruments since my tenn years, and have a strong connection with cinema, having completed up to the 7th quarter of the cinema major. In all projects, I apply my four main talents: Logical Reasoning, Sensitivity, Creativity, and Knowledge.
aboutme_content_p5: If you are looking for a fullstack developer who combines technical expertise with a creative vision, you are in the right place. Let's create something amazing together!
